meta.description: Optimize the number of electric bikes and scooters to maximize meal deliveries given charge and vehicle constraints.

sets.name: VEHICLES
sets.description: Types of electric vehicles used for meal delivery.

params.name: capacity
params.description: Number of meals each vehicle type can hold.

params.name: charge
params.description: Units of charge required for each vehicle type.

vars.name: x
vars.description: Number of each type of vehicle to use.

objective.name: max_meals_delivered
objective.description: Maximize the total number of meals delivered.

constraints.name: charge_limit
constraints.description: Total charge used by vehicles must not exceed available charge.

constraints.name: bike_limit
constraints.description: At most 30% of the vehicles can be bikes.

constraints.name: scooter_minimum
constraints.description: At least 20 scooters must be used.
